Gaming, history, and teaching us about spacecraft 🚀

Jan 27, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • govtech
  • NASA
  • Space
  • history
  • kerbal space program

Adam Roberts creator of the GameplayReviewUK Youtube channel joins us to talk about space. We’ll chat about how they make use of the video platform to share knowledge about space exploration and its history, how they seek to make that information more accessible, and what it’s like to be a content creator.
